website_summaries.verdict: The best professional hunting broadhead to buy for better results compared to budget models.
pros: 2.3-inch stainless steel blades are extremely durable and sharp for repeated use
Profile of the hunting tip is extremely aerodynamic for better accuracy and penetration
cons: Not recommended for light draw weights

customer_reviews.title: Hope it’s as good as the original/discontinued Rage Xtreme 2 Blade Broadhead, 100 Grain
customer_reviews.text: High expectations for this Broadhead . I’ve had great results from the similar Broadhead (ORIGINAL Rage Xtreme 2 Blade Broadhead, 100 Grain). Please bring back the original Rage Xtreme 2 Blade Broadhead, 100 Grain.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: They are advertised on Amazon with one practice broad head in the package, the three packages that I received there are No Practice broad heads.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Efaw

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: These things are for real! I took my first shot with one today, and the arrow blew through the deer as if it wasn’t even there. The broadhead left a 2+ inch entry AND exit wound. The deer made it 30 yards before dropping. The arrow hit exactly where I expected - flew just like my practice arrows. I’m so impressed, I’ve ordered a second batch of these to make sure I don’t run out mid-season.
customer_reviews.author: Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap chinese knockoffs. Buyer bewarned
customer_reviews.text: These are Chinese knockoffs. I bought an identical pair at Cabelas and there is a huge difference between the two. First off the sharpness... I can finger bang these and be completely fine. Anyone that has experienced true rages will know you have to be careful... secondly there are distinct design differences between the two. They don't look like they would effect the performance to much but I dont see why any ethical hunter would take that chance using these...
customer_reviews.author: erock11

customer_reviews.title: ... sharp blades expand well upon impact and do an excellent job on harvesting animals
customer_reviews.text: The razor sharp blades expand well upon impact and do an excellent job on harvesting animals. The shock collars are very small and a little difficult to install correctly on the broadheads. But once you install it and put the broadhead on an arrow/bolt, you don't have to worry about it anymore as it locks it into place. Also, the practice broadhead can catch on the mesh filling of some targets and pull the mesh out of the hole when you're removing the arrow.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: big doe appeared at the edge of cover and took her sweet time coming into range
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on Friday (Dec. 18)with two days left in New York firearms season. I was psyched to get a head start on the 10 day archery season that follows our regular season. Sitting in tree stand on Dec. 19 when a very cautious, big doe appeared at the edge of cover and took her sweet time coming into range. Quartering toward me with her head down at 20 yds and I decided to take a less than perfect shot (because we had a fresh snowfall and I figured I'd find her). She ran 30 yds and piled up in full view. Massive damage from this broadhead !!
customer_reviews.author: thomas f. burke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This broadhead cuts a huge hole. Shot a buck at 35 yards and hit him in the shoulder a little high. Penetration was about 12 inches with a two inch entry hole and no exit hole. There was absolutely no blood trail, but he crashed after running 40 yards dead!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Webb

customer_reviews.title: Lost my deer
customer_reviews.text: Never opened upon impact on deer went right through like a field tip , no blood trail lost the animal. Always thought rage was the best never again for me . Shooting rage x-treme 100 grain crossbow heads deer at 20 yes broadside right through the found arrow in tree behind deer, hair and cartilage but no blood never opened till it hit the tree
customer_reviews.author: tom walz

customer_reviews.title: NO PRACTICE TIP
customer_reviews.text: Sis not come with a practice tip. Would recommend something else with a practice tip. I may change my review once I have a chance to see how it performs, but right now, I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Derek E

customer_reviews.title: Tips are great. Nice and sharp cant wait to get them ...
customer_reviews.text: Tips are great. Nice and sharp cant wait to get them attached. Would be 5 star but did not come with the practice head it states it comes with. Amazon did offer to replace it or give full refund. I opted for a partial refund. Not enough to buy a practice broadhead but seeing as there's no time to waste before deer opener here in WI i couldn't wait for a replacement. Otherwise it comes with everything else in description.
customer_reviews.author: AdamK

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but...
customer_reviews.text: Accuracy seems to be pretty good but the 2 out of the 3 shots, one of the blades didn’t deploy ( 3/9 total). Could be the foams fault but the kinetic energy should’ve opened them up i think. If i’m doing anything wrong please help. The collar was tighten down properly.
customer_reviews.author: Public account

customer_reviews.title: The practice head doesn’t pull out of my bag target
customer_reviews.text: It really does shoot exactly like a field point. So i can use a bag target with my crossbow. Those fixed blade broadheads really eat up a target
customer_reviews.author: Brad Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Concern
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of rage products and recently purchased a crossbow and bought the rage product for that. Only opportunities I had to use it was on a coyote at 10 yards and the broad head dispatched the coyote perfectly but exploded in the process. My fear is on a larger size target it may malfunction before exiting target. It definitely works but hope this was a isolated incident.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Solid Broadhead without failure
customer_reviews.text: Never had an issue with these opening like they are supposed to. Good penetration and blood trails.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Strong. Fly's great.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Good value. Works great. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Got my buck with it.
customer_reviews.text: Kills deer dead even with low fps crossbow - at 52 yards even.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W Martz

customer_reviews.title: Devastating head
customer_reviews.text: Best broadhead on the market, absolutely devistating if stay away from the shoulder, best blood trails ive ever seen, have shot both whitetails and bears with them
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broadhead
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding result with an elk. Opened great. Longer shot and still broke through 3 ribs. Elk walked less than 30 yrds. I will use again.
customer_reviews.author: AZ diver

customer_reviews.title: Brutal
customer_reviews.text: These are the best you can get. They work great on deer and turkey, and hopefully soon will work on an elk!
customer_reviews.author: Spokane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great heads. I have used these for years in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great heads. I have used these for years in my compound but changed to a cross bow and needed the new plastic style ring that holds the blades in place. These blades still do come unlocked from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Russ T.

customer_reviews.title: Fly Straight
customer_reviews.text: I love how Rage broad heads fly. Great blood trails. Not the most robust heads on the market, but accuracy trumps durability.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: No Practice heads as stated?!?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Not even sure how these perform yet but the details states I get practice head. Practice Makes Perfect - Includes free practice head to ensure you will be on target when it counts!" I do not see them in the package!
customer_reviews.author: Bev & Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great broadhead
customer_reviews.text: Great broadhead. Very accurate, good penetration and awesome blood trail
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW. AWESOME.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet broad heads! Very sharp and wow do they leave a monster cutting hole! Not sure how ANYTHING would service these things!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Grady

customer_reviews.title: Massive Wound
customer_reviews.text: I have used other Crossbow hunting blades and this is the one that works the best for me. This one will leave a good blood trail and creates a massive wound.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Inkell

customer_reviews.title: Love my rage
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to use next season great price fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: much better than they used to be
customer_reviews.text: Have not yet used, but seems to be in line with all the other rage broadheads I have used. Im impressed at the quality of the practice head. much better than they used to be, but they do still get stuck in my non-foam targets.
customer_reviews.author: James David

customer_reviews.title: Kill deer with a big cut.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flight. Wish the replacement blades were less expensive as two of three that I killed deer with broke one of the blades.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coomer

customer_reviews.title: Just like pictured
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and pictured. My husbands go to brand for hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Scott

customer_reviews.title: Bent Blade after the first clean kill.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars but I shot my first hog with a crossbow and did do it's job however, it bent the blade so it's done. For the cost and one kill use is the reason I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Performed as Described!
customer_reviews.text: The broad heads performed exactly as described. They are accurate in addition to being devastating.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Paster

customer_reviews.title: They get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Great penetration and lots of blood to track, although I didn’t have to track very far.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Super Sharp and Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Unreal Broadhead.. Sliced like it was butter. Killed my first Hog with it and it didn't go far. Cleaned it up afterward and ready for the next hunt. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: They did not come with a practice tip like I expected
customer_reviews.text: Have not used these yet. They did not come with a practice tip like I expected. Don't loose the shock collars when you open them. They are sharp and ready to humanely harvest game.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: ... haven't shot a deer yet but if they preform like the Rage broad heads I have used in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't shot a deer yet but if they preform like the Rage broad heads I have used in the past they are 5 star! They don't fail even if your shot isn't the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blood trail
customer_reviews.text: 8pt didn’t run 50 yards after impact. Left a blood trail a blind man could follow. Entrance and exit hole were huge
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Pauley

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite
customer_reviews.text: Love em, this was our first year in Oregon we could use em. Got a 6 x 5 opening day of elk season. Definitely using them again this year.
customer_reviews.author: William Pennington

customer_reviews.title: it's like you took a bucket and poured blood on the ...
customer_reviews.text: With this broad head, you want need to track you deer to far. From the point of impact, it's like you took a bucket and poured blood on the ground. Bearly made it 20 yards. And the entrance was just as large as the exit.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel spires

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought these Rage Crossbow Extreme broadheads for the upcoming 2018 whitetail hunting. Came with 3 heads PLUS one practice head. Cant wait sling these through the air!
customer_reviews.author: Vito

customer_reviews.title: Shot my first archery deer this season with these broad ...
customer_reviews.text: Shot my first archery deer this season with these broad heads, he dropped in his tracks and the hole was bigger than a lot of bullet holes I've seen
customer_reviews.author: Reid Walden

customer_reviews.title: ... had ordered these and he says these are the greatest broadheads; as an avid hunter he sure voices ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend had ordered these and he says these are the greatest broadheads; as an avid hunter he sure voices his opinions as to what he likes and what he doesnt like.
customer_reviews.author: lucas_crazy_momma

customer_reviews.title: He loved it. They didn't help him get a Deer ...
customer_reviews.text: He loved it. They didn't help him get a Deer though!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to save money and get them delivered
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for years. It's nice to save money and get them delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Kchawk

customer_reviews.title: superior advantage hunter
customer_reviews.text: you can't even imagine how massive the blood trails are with this broadhead. superior advantage hunter !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Zangari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome broadheads. Highly recommend. In one side and out the other
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable. The hole and the blood. Never saw anything like it. Almost like a 450 Marlin going through. Complete pass through on a 185 pounder with no tip or blade damage. Will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered for grandson to go with his new bow. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for grandson to go with his new bow. Surprise him with them. He has used this in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mechanicals but Troublesome to take on and off
customer_reviews.text: Nice Mechanicals but Troublesome to take on and off. The markings on the little black rings are virtually impossible to see
customer_reviews.author: Rick Gill

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money, received in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: Sharp shooter

customer_reviews.title: Both with great blood trail
customer_reviews.text: Shot 2 deer with these. One went 40 yards one went 50 yards. Both with great blood trail. As with any broadhead shot placement is important.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Rage broadheads do an excellent job on bringing the deer down I just shot ...
customer_reviews.text: Rage broadheads do an excellent job on bringing the deer down I just shot a nice 10 pointer the other day and he didn't go 20 yards and he was done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Destroyed the deer, survived to fight another day. These have been great broad heads for me. Sharp, big cut hole.
customer_reviews.author: who knows

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my first two bucks shot and killed through the lungs. Had no problem tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat a Rage!
customer_reviews.text: Great broadhead! I have shot Rage tips for years and will say this is my favorite so far. I shot a 8pt buck at 30yards and watched him drop. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LaFollette

customer_reviews.title: Much Improved.
customer_reviews.text: Rage has come a long way in improving the blade deployment, and frankly, these broadheads do an amazing job. I just recently finished a hog hunt and gave these a try. I'm using a Matthews Monster at 50lbs. My typical broadhead for hogs is a fixed blade given the tough hide that needs to be penetrated. However, these did an incredible job of quickly and humanely taking the animal and putting 200lbs of pork in my freezer. The boar traveled only 10 yards before succumbing. The two blades are now my default broad head on all hunts.
customer_reviews.author: BowHunter60

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome performance! Flies true and packs a punch. Definitely didn't have a problem fallowing the blood trail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are the bomb already got 110# doe on first day!
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this broad head
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this broad head. I shot a buck and he dropped dead 40yds from where is hit him in the lungs. Very good blood trail from the point of impact to where I found him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... SC RESPECTIVELY FOR THIRTY YEARS AND THIS IS MY FAVORITE BROADHEAD OF ALL TIME
customer_reviews.text: IVE BEEN HUNTING IN NC AND SC RESPECTIVELY FOR THIRTY YEARS AND THIS IS MY FAVORITE BROADHEAD OF ALL TIME , PERIOD!
customer_reviews.author: PARRIS PATTON

customer_reviews.title: Reason why Rage is #1
customer_reviews.text: Fast service , Rage what more do you need to say!
customer_reviews.author: John Dunnavant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Extremely fast shipping. 3 days before expected date. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I have been shooting these for a few years and they never fail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product have shot different rages all with great succsess
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fly the best and put a huge hole in whatever your shooting.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Blades!!! Took down a nice Doe with them !!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael John Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These things are nasty. Never had one Run over 15 yards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than previous Rage Broadheads
customer_reviews.text: I have had some issues with the threaded portion of older Rage blades failing (breaking off at the threads), but I blew right though bone on a good sized Whitetail last week with one of these and the only thing that broke was my arrow shaft. BIG clean entry and exit holes, and the deer went nowhere. Seems to be a great product. Hopefully I get to use the other 3 this season.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carson

customer_reviews.title: NO TRACKING REQUIRED WITH THIS BROADHEAD
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY A DEVASTATING BROADHEAD!!!!! No tracking required, blood loss is massive and fatal within seconds!!!!!! I have killed 9 Deer with this broadhead!! Everyone fell within sight.
customer_reviews.author: John Carr

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Im going to try bto use these on my Cross bow i just got recently. I like the fast deleivery and Ive used these on the target and they seem to fly pretty good . Only time will tell how it strikes my kills.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I was really excited about these but they almost always ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these but they almost always prematurely deploy in my crossbow quiver leading me to believe they will most likely do so on flight also
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Going back to fixed blades, Rage over rated.
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed with this broad head. Heart lung area hit produced very little blood loss to the ground, 2 deer thus hit traveled a long way after hit.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene McDonald

customer_reviews.title: I hit a nice buck with it in a good spot and didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The shock collars are a pain to deal with. I hit a nice buck with it in a good spot and didn't pass threw or do a enough damage to take the buck down
customer_reviews.author: CDR

customer_reviews.title: Function as described. I am please with broadhead flight ...
customer_reviews.text: Function as described. I am please with broadhead flight and performance, but ITEM DOES NOT COME WITH PRACTICE HEAD as indicated in the description. You will have to buy a pack of practice heads ($25) or sacrifice one as a practice tip (and your target) if you want to tune your sight to these heads.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Kenzie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Have not got to use them yet due to season not being open however I only use rage broad heads and without a doubt they are the best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Limestone Creek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent broadhead complete devastation and with the shock collar it ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent broadhead complete devastation and with the shock collar it has completely solved the premature deployment in flight. Blades stay nice and tight in my cheap walmart quiver. Thought I would have to buy the rage cage quiver to prevent blade deployment but with the shock collar no need.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great broad heads recommended to me
customer_reviews.text: Great broad heads recommended to me. Glad I followed his advice. The two pigs were brought down in less than 3 seconds by quick, clean, ethical kills. Highly recommend the Rage practice broadheads so you know you are sighted-in without messing up your "business" broadheads.
customer_reviews.author: CH Central Coast

customer_reviews.title: Loved the Rage Extreme Chisel 2 Blade Broadhead but
customer_reviews.text: Loved the Rage Extreme Chisel 2 Blade Broadhead but.......... the 3 pack I ordered came in with only 2, so this made them a little expensive, but I will only shoot the Chisel tip Rage. the blood trail is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake Rage
customer_reviews.text: Never had this problem before, but got fake Rages. Shot deer and whole chizel tip popped off. Do not weight close to 100 grains either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Product was exactly as described. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with a practice head as stated in description.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybo

product_meta.title: Rage Bowhunting Xtreme Series Mechanical Broadheads, 2 Blade, 100 Grain 2.3 Inch Cutting Diameter, 3 Pack
product_meta.description: Rage is leading the evolution in lethal technology. The Slip cam Broadheads are the world's best mechanical Broadheads. Rage is known for accuracy. Rage wound channels are legendary. Choose Reliability...Choose Rage.
feature_bullets: Sweeping blade angle maintains kinetic energy longer
Not recommended for draw weights under 55 pounds
Leading blade honed to surgical sharpness

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
